title: Deco-influenced face
content:
Any thoughts on this here sample?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419055306/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_17.png) | 13.74 KB |
author: Ampersanderson

comments.content:
Those shapes are really cool. It doesn't look like you've put enough (any?) overshoot on the 'A', 'O', and 'V'. Otherwise, I like it.

- Lex

you're right about that. try this...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419055306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/overshoot_6350.png)

Cool. Let's see more letters.

- Lex

well, what i don't have for you is more letterforms...yet. what i do have is this...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419055306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/twist_3680.png)

i love the shapes

i just don't get the thin black outline  
i think it would be much better without

let's see more letters !
